name: Jack Nicklaus presents The Major Championship Courses of 1990
description:
This is another add-on to original American Jack Nicklaus' Greatest 18 Holes of Major Championship Golf or its European remake Jack Nicklaus' Unlimited Golf & Course Design contains extra course disk including:
  1. Medinah Country Club (U.S. Open Championship)
  2. St. Andrews Old Course (British Open Championship)
  3. Shoal Creek (PGA Championship)
alsoFor: Apple IIgs, DOS, Macintosh | Combined View
